word:
In the visions of the night I am charged by the Lord to warn you against this. I want you to be a happy man in this life, a representation 


                                 -165- 

of what a minister of Christ should be. Work diligently to make your calling and election sure. Bring peace into your heart, even the peace of Christ. Learn of Christ, and thus become fitted to unite with the family of the redeemed. Our time here is short. Prepare, prepare to meet thy God.
